ygData.subject: RE: Salting
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve found a lot of different types of meat on Lockjaw after killing him. Sometimes he has no meat, sometimes he has 3 or 4 different kinds.  Gnome, Dwarf,
ygData.messageBody:
I've found a lot of different types of meat on Lockjaw after killing him.
Sometimes he has no meat, sometimes he has 3 or 4 different kinds. Gnome,
Dwarf, High elf, Dark elf, etc. I've always wondered if the type of meat
you find has anything to do with other players that he's eaten as he
rampaged throughout the zone.


Elwyn
26th Level Bard
Erollosi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Kennedy [mailto:orang@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 5:41 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Salting


From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>

>From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> I was fighting spiders in E. Karana a while back and got 'Halfling
> parts" as loot. (eeuuww) Twice. Quite a shock. I think it was salted
> by someone with a wicked sense of humor but I'm not 100 percent sure.
> It is conceivable that a giant spider would have Halfling parts
> (Samwise, where is Frodo anyway...) but I haven't seen this extreme
> level of humor before from variant. Anyone else have a similar
> experience?
>
> Bujold 18th
> Xegony


That's what I've gotten from them. Someone at Verant just has
a grisly sense of humor
